div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 171 Mycenae, Argolis, 1895 (716) Burial: 240-240 B.C. (Hackens) Contents: 3786 AR. Found in 3 pots Leucas: 1 st. Corinth: 7 St.; 254 dr.; 35 triob. Phlius: 82 triob.; 51 trihemiob. Argos: 1763 triob. ; 1175 trihemiob.; 416 ob. Ptolemy II: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Athens â€ Lambropoulos, ArchEph 1896, pp. 137-200 (well illus.) Hackens, Antidorum W. Peremans, pp. 91-2
